segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally pouring over her foot, and she hasn't even flinched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so frustrated to see such a lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, those children are playing a dangerous game with that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy could seriously hurt himself if he falls from that height.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him tumbling backward gives me a jolt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the water damage to the floor and cabinets will be significant if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for multiple accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a growing sense of alarm watching it all unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredibly annoying to witness so many preventable hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
